references.paper_title: An iterative regularized incremental projected subgradient method for a class of bilevel optimization problems
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the study of iterative methods for solving bilevel optimization problems.

references.paper_title: A first order method for finding minimal norm-like solutions of convex optimization problems
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational first-order method for solving convex optimization problems that is relevant to the simple bilevel optimization problem.
This reference provides background on the algorithms and complexity of convex optimization, which is crucial for understanding the approaches to bilevel optimization.

references.paper_title: A method with convergence rates for optimization problems with variational inequality constraints
references.reason: This paper offers a method with convergence rates for optimization problems with variational inequality constraints, relevant to the bilevel optimization problem.

references.paper_title: A first order method for solving convex bilevel optimization problems
references.reason: This is an important early work establishing a first-order method for solving bilevel optimization problems.
